name: Two is worse than one
description:
// Controls:

Space - Jump

A - Left

D - Right

Mouse - Look and shoot

// WARNING:

THIS GAME WAS MADE IN UNDER 4 HOURS AND IS VERY CRAPPY AND UNFINISHED. PLEASE KEEP THIS IN MIND WHEN PLAYING. I MAINLY WANTED TO SUBMIT SOMETHING SO HERE IT IS.

"Two is better than one" is a simple 2d platformer where you use guns to kill the two enemies that join together half way through the fight.

Music, art, code, and everything else was made by me in 4 hours.

NOTE: I couldnt get webgl to work so i just exported windows. Its really scuffed.
